Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Dodgers have a strong 52-29 record at home and a 98-64 overall record, with a particularly strong performance when scoring at least five runs (77-15).
The New York Yankees have a 50-31 road record and a 94-68 overall record, with the fifth-ranked ERA in the AL at 3.75.
The Dodgers are 3-1 in the season series against the Yankees.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Key players to watch include Shohei Ohtani for the Dodgers, with notable performance stats, and Aaron Judge for the Yankees, leading the team with a.322 batting average.
Injury lists for both teams include several key players on the IL, affecting their performance in the game.
Others: The article provides details about the teams' regular season performance, including standings and key player stats.
